text:
Hi.
Is there a way to add a custom link, for example `All` to post filter -module using tags as filter value?

hey there - if I add a form field to my module, is it possible to use JS to add/remove fields on the form itself based on the value a user inserts into a preceding field? Will this mess with submissions?

Hello All,  I made a repeater module that is used for leadership on a company page.  It displays cards with an animation that reveals name and position but wanted to add functionality that displays a bio when clicked.  I added some Javascript that makes a popup and dims the page but have been stuck on how to get the info on a specific card to display in the popup.   Does anyone know how to reference a specific instance of a repeater item when clicked?  Is there a different way of solving this problem?  Thanks,
